item.title: Dynamics 365: The Next Chapter of MS Cloud Business Apps - Surviving CRM
item.description:
Dynamics 365: The Next Chapter of MS Cloud Business Apps - Surviving CRM

Have you heard about this brand new thing called "Dynamics 365" yet? If you attended or followed the WPC 2016 conference, I bet you have, since it was the big headline news for Microsoft's partners and corporate customers that kicked off their FY17.

item.title: Microsoft Dynamics AX - Microsoft Dynamics CustomerSource
Create an Online Email Form with Azure Logic Apps
item.description:
Create an Online Email Form with Azure Logic Apps

After over a year in preview, Azure Logic Apps reached general availability last month. As part of the GA announcement, a new serverless consumption pricing model was added. This meant that Logic Apps no longer need to be part of an App Service Plan.

item.title: Debate on Extensions Grows: Microsoft Dynamics NAV Professionals Weigh the Impact
item.description:
Debate on Extensions Grows: Microsoft Dynamics NAV Professionals Weigh the Impact

Microsoft Dynamics NAV roadmap, July 2016 Microsoft is preparing two new product releases related to Dynamics NAV in late 2016: NAV 2017 and the Financials portion of Dynamics 365 for Business (that's the SMB option, currently in preview as Project Madeira).

item.title: Power BI July Update for Service and Mobile
item.description:
Power BI July Update for Service and Mobile

We have some really cool features to announce this month, including data driven alerts that let you receive notifications when the data you care about the most goes beyond the range you set. The Power BI service team is always listening to your feedback and improving our product based on what we hear.

item.title: Dynamics NAV is Dead! Long live Dynamics NAV!
item.description:
Dynamics NAV is Dead! Long live Dynamics NAV!

Directions USA published their agenda today and the agenda for NAVTechDays is getting more clear each week too. What can we learn from these agenda's? Its all about Extensions, Cloud and Dynamics 365 for Financials aka project "Madeira". Is that a bad thing? I guess you should make that call after attending these great events....

item.title: Microsoft Opens First Common Data Model (CDM) Preview for PowerApps - MSDynamicsWorld.com
item.description:
Microsoft Opens First Common Data Model (CDM) Preview for PowerApps - MSDynamicsWorld.com

Microsoft has released a common data model (CDM) public preview for PowerApps focused on sales, case management, purchasing, and foundational data.

item.title: Announcing Azure Logic Apps general availability
item.description:
Announcing Azure Logic Apps general availability

Today we are announcing the general availability of Azure Logic Apps, Microsoft's Integration Platform-as-a-Service (iPaaS) offering that enables rapid, enterprise-grade, hybrid application connectivity. At the Integrate 2016 conference in London, we shared our vision to build a comprehensive hybrid integration platform that allows customers to seamlessly connect traditional on-premises systems and cloud-native applications.

item.title: Microsoft Flow and the Microsoft Common Data Model
item.description:
Microsoft Flow and the Microsoft Common Data Model

Today we are excited to announce the public preview of the Microsoft Common Data Model integrated in Microsoft Flow. The Microsoft Common Data Model is an out-of-box business database for storing and managing business entities. The preview is available today as a first class business database for your flows.
